name: wordpress-theme
description: An example WordPress theme repository which simplifies development.

scripts.lint: prettier --check --debug-check . && npm run composer run lint
scripts.lint:fix: prettier --write . && npm run composer run lint:fix
scripts.test: jest && npm run composer run test
scripts.db:seed-php: wp-env run cli wp eval-file database.php
scripts.db:seed-sql: wp-env run cli wp db import database.sql
scripts.query: wp-env run cli wp db query

author: Zachary K. Watkins
